mapper.select: select d.* from ums_admin a left join ums_admin_role_relation b on a.id = b.admin_id left join ums_role_menu_relation c on b.role_id = c.role_id left join ums_menu d on c.menu_id = d.id where a.username = #{username} order by d.sort asc
SELECT b.ancestor FROM ums_admin a LEFT JOIN ums_company_relation b ON a.company_id = b.descendant WHERE a.id=#{userid} ORDER BY b.depth desc

select a.id id, a.username username, a.nickname nickname, a.icon icon, a.email email, a.ext ext, a.phone phone, a.openid openid, a.company_id companyId, a.note note, a.create_time createTime, a.status status, b.name companyName from ums_admin a left join ums_company b on a.company_id = b.id where a.username=#{username}
